data.title: Pentair Aurora
data.meta_description: Pentair Aurora is a leading supplier of pumps and pump systems used in a variety of markets and applications throughout the world. Our pumps are known for
data.text: Pentair Aurora is a leading supplier of pumps and pump systems used in a variety of markets and applications throughout the world. Our pumps are known for consistent, quality manufacturing and performance that outlasts competitors. Aurora Pump draws on its 95 years of experience to provide you with the pumping solutions you need. Aurora's commitment to excellence goes beyond the product line. We are dedicated to incorporating the latest technologies in pump manufacturing. Our online software programs assist you with selecting the best pumps and systems along with pump drawings and specifications. These programs save valuable time in the selection and evaluation of pumps and systems. From Commercial, Fire Protection, Industrial, Marine, Oil and Gas to Municipal /Water Treatment, Pentair Aurora provides Inspired Solutions for a Changing World.
